Articles.Content:
1. stage

6 regular engines with 3 gimballed engines in the middle to make it fly straight and keep it controllable. This stage is designed to do most of the work for achieving orbit around Kerbin.

2. stage

1 gimballed engine. Designed to do a small burn for the orbit around Kerbin, a trans munar injection, and most of the decent to Mun.

Lander stage

This stage is only powered by RCS and is designed to land on Mun. Around 50 seconds of RCS fuel.

Return stage

Fly me to the Mun (and back)

[list type=decimal]

[li]Enable SAS[/li]

[li]100% throttle[/li]

[li]Next stage (space)[/li]

[li]At about 22,000km start going east[/li]

[li]When/if the apoapsis reaches about 80-100km cut the engine until you are near the apoapsis[/li]

[li]Go to the next stage when the outer engines are out of fuel[/li]

[li]Go to the next stage when the inner engines are out of fuel OR just before you are in a good orbit (to prevent space junk)[/li]

[li]Burn the 2. stage until you are in a good orbit[/li]

[li]When you see the Mun rise up the horizon burn east until your apoapsis is about 11,000,000m[/li]

[li](Correct the trajectory if you are on a crash course to Mun)[/li]

[li]At the periapsis burn west until the periapsis is at about 10-15,000m[/li]

[li]^again on the other side of Mun[/li]

[li]Choose a place to land and stop the rockets horizontal velocity just before that place[/li]

[li]Do a controlled descend (SAS might help)[/li]

[li]At 600m:

  • [li]Make vertical velocity be close to 0[/li]
    [li]Shut off the engine[/li]
    [li]Go to next stage[/li]
    [li]Enable RCS[/li]
    [li]Lower the landing gear[/li]
    [li]Continue the descend with RCS. Protip: Avoid going past 10m/s.[/li]

[/li]

[li]If you have SAS enabled turn it off just before landing[/li]

[li]Land with about 0-4m/s[/li]

[li] 8) or :\'([/li]

[li]100% throttle[/li]

[li]Next stage[/li]

[li]Burn east until you are at escape velocity[/li]

[li]When you are in orbit around Kerbin correct its periapsis to be around 45,000m[/li]

[li]Next stage (make sure that you aren\'t going to get hit by the thing when you deploy the parachute!)[/li]

[li]Deploy parachutes when the Gee\'s are low enough.[/li]

[li]Mission completed 8)[/li]

Download is below
